docs.snippet: Inter Milan forward Mauro Icardi was at the centre of two storms after scoring twice against former club Sampdoria on Sunday, one over his goal celebration and the other involving a refused hand shake....
docs.lead_paragraph: Inter Milan forward Mauro Icardi was at the centre of two storms after scoring twice against former club Sampdoria on Sunday, one over his goal celebration and the other involving a refused hand shake.

docs.snippet: Five high school students and three chaperones have been confirmed dead or are unaccounted for after a charter bus heading to Humboldt State University was struck by a FedEx tractor-trailer in Northern California. The bus and big rig drivers were ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Five high school students and three chaperones have been confirmed dead or are unaccounted for after a charter bus heading to Humboldt State University was struck by a FedEx tractor-trailer in Northern California. The bus and big rig drivers were also killed.

headline.main: Engaged Pair, Teen Athlete Among Dead in Bus Crash
headline.print_headline: Engaged Pair, Teen Athlete Among Dead in Bus Crash

docs.snippet: Prosecutors in Missoula County are lashing out against a federal inquiry into their record on sexual assault cases....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Missoula County are lashing out against a federal inquiry into their record on sexual assault cases.
docs.abstract: Prosecutors in Missoula County, Mont, are lashing out against federal inquiry into their record on sexual assault cases; Justice Dept says office of county prosecutor Fred Van Valkenburg has disregarded sexual assaults to point that it is placing 'women in Missoula at increased risk of harm.'

headline.main: Accusation in Montana of Treating Rape Lightly Stirs Unlikely Public Fight
headline.print_headline: Accusation in Montana of Treating Rape Lightly Stirs Unlikely Public Fight

docs.snippet: Liverpool F.C. is in position to win England’s top league for the first time since 1990, but memories of the stadium disaster that killed 96 soccer fans in 1989 still haunt the city....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool F.C. is in position to win England’s top league for the first time since 1990, but memories of the stadium disaster that killed 96 soccer fans in 1989 still haunt the city.
docs.abstract: Twenty five years since 96 Liverpool soccer fans died inside Hillsborough Stadium in Sheffield, evidence suggests that disaster was more than horrible accident; Liverpool FC is in position to win its first title in England’s top league since 1990; many fans and longtime residents of city have said that it is specious to link the anniversary controversy to a pleasing turn of form on the field.

headline.main: 25 Years After Stadium Disaster, Liverpool Still Mourns
